highlights.representative_text: I had learned from years of experience with men that when a man really desires a thing so deeply that he is willing to stake his entire future on a single turn of the wheel in order to get it, he is sure to win.

highlights.representative_text: Success comes to those who become SUCCESS-CONSCIOUS. Failure comes to those who indifferently allow themselves to become FAILURE-CONSCIOUS.

highlights.representative_text: When poet William Ernest Henley wrote the prophetic lines, "I am the Master of my Fate, I am the Captain of my Soul," he should have informed us that we are the Masters of our Fate, the Captains of our Souls, because we have the power to control our thoughts.

highlights.representative_text: There comes now a statement which will give a better understanding of the importance the principle of autosuggestion assumes in the transmutation of desire into its physical, or monetary, equivalent: FAITH is a state of mind which may be induced, or created, by affirmations or repeated instructions to the subconscious mind, through the principle of autosuggestion.

highlights.representative_text: By following the instructions laid down in the chapters on autosuggestion (Chapter 3) and the subconscious mind (Chapter 11), as summarized in the chapter on autosuggestion, you can CONVINCE your subconscious mind that you believe you will receive that for which you ask. Your subconscious mind will act upon that belief, then pass it back to you in the form of FAITH, followed by definite plans for procuring that which you desire.

highlights.representative_text: FAITH is the starting point of all accumulation of riches! FAITH is the basis of all "miracles" and all mysteries which cannot be analyzed by the rules of science! FAITH is the element which transforms the ordinary "vibration of thought," created by the finite human mind, into its spiritual equivalent. FAITH is the only agency through which the cosmic force of Infinite Intelligence can be harnessed and used by humanity.

highlights.selected_text: Opinions are the cheapest commodities on earth

highlights.representative_text: Analysis of several hundred people who had accumulated fortunes well beyond the million-dollar mark disclosed the fact that every one of them had the habit of REACHING DECISIONS PROMPTLY and of changing these decisions slowly, if and when they were changed.
highlights.selected_text: every one of them had the habit of REACHING DECISIONS PROMPTLY and of changing these decisions slowly

highlights.representative_text: It is interesting also to observe that these important changes usually begin in the form of a DEFINITE DECISION in the minds of a relatively small number of people.
highlights.selected_text: important changes usually begin in the form of a DEFINITE DECISION in the minds of a relatively small number of people

highlights.representative_text: People who accumulate great fortunes are generally thought of as cold-blooded and sometimes ruthless. Often they are misunderstood. What they have is willpower, which they mix with PERSISTENCE and place back of their desires to ensure the attainment of their objectives.
highlights.selected_text: People who accumulate great fortunes are generally thought of as cold-blooded and sometimes ruthless. Often they are misunderstood. What they have is willpower, which they mix with PERSISTENCE and place back of their desires to ensure the attainment of their objectives

highlights.representative_text: Wherever men and women accumulate great riches, you may be sure they first acquired PERSISTENCE.
highlights.selected_text: Wherever men and women accumulate great riches, you may be sure they first acquired PERSISTENCE

highlights.representative_text: POVERTY is attracted to the one whose mind is favorable to it, as money is attracted to the one whose mind has been deliberately prepared to attract it, and through the same laws. POVERTY CONSCIOUSNESS WILL VOLUNTARILY SEIZE THE MIND WHICH IS NOT OCCUPIED WITH MONEY CONSCIOUSNESS.
highlights.selected_text: POVERTY is attracted to the one whose mind is favorable to it, as money is attracted to the one whose mind has been deliberately prepared to attract it, and through the same laws. POVERTY CONSCIOUSNESS WILL VOLUNTARILY SEIZE THE MIND WHICH IS NOT OCCUPIED WITH MONEY CONSCIOUSNESS

highlights.representative_text: Follow the instructions outlined in these chapters until your "habit nature" hands over a clear picture of the object of your DESIRE to your subconscious mind, which works continuously while you are awake and while you are asleep.
highlights.selected_text: Follow the instructions outlined in these chapters until your "habit nature" hands over a clear picture of the object of your DESIRE to your subconscious mind, which works continuously while you are awake and while you are asleep

highlights.representative_text: The mind absorbs and becomes a part of the daily experiences upon which it feeds.
highlights.selected_text: The mind absorbs and becomes a part of the daily experiences upon which it feeds

highlights.representative_text: I ask you to evaluate yourself on this point because lack of persistence is one of the major causes of failure.
highlights.selected_text: lack of persistence is one of the major causes of failure

highlights.representative_text: Those who have cultivated the HABIT of persistence seem to enjoy insurance against failure. No matter how many times they are defeated, they finally arrive at the top of the ladder.
highlights.selected_text: Those who have cultivated the HABIT of persistence seem to enjoy insurance against failure. No matter how many times they are defeated, they finally arrive at the top of the ladder

highlights.representative_text: She said, "Very well, Broadway, you may whip some, but not me. I'm going to force you to give up."
highlights.selected_text: Very well, Broadway, you may whip some, but not me. I'm going to force you to give up

highlights.representative_text: THERE IS NO SUBSTITUTE FOR PERSISTENCE! It cannot be supplanted by any other quality! Remember this and it will hearten you in the beginning, when the going may seem difficult and slow.
highlights.selected_text: THERE IS NO SUBSTITUTE FOR PERSISTENCE! It cannot be supplanted by any other quality! Remember this and it will hearten you in the beginning, when the going may seem difficult and slow

highlights.representative_text: A DEFINITE PURPOSE BACKED BY BURNING DESIRE FOR ITS FULFILLMENT. A DEFINITE PLAN, EXPRESSED IN CONTINUOUS ACTION. A MIND CLOSED TIGHTLY AGAINST ALL NEGATIVE AND DISCOURAGING INFLUENCES, including negative suggestions of relatives, friends and acquaintances. A FRIENDLY ALLIANCE WITH ONE OR MORE PERSONS WHO WILL ENCOURAGE ONE TO FOLLOW THROUGH WITH BOTH PLAN AND PURPOSE.
highlights.selected_text: A DEFINITE PURPOSE BACKED BY BURNING DESIRE FOR ITS FULFILLMENT. A DEFINITE PLAN, EXPRESSED IN CONTINUOUS ACTION. A MIND CLOSED TIGHTLY AGAINST ALL NEGATIVE AND DISCOURAGING INFLUENCES, including negative suggestions of relatives, friends and acquaintances. A FRIENDLY ALLIANCE WITH ONE OR MORE PERSONS WHO WILL ENCOURAGE ONE TO FOLLOW THROUGH WITH BOTH PLAN AND PURPOSE

highlights.representative_text: The time to nurse an idea is at the time of its birth. Every minute it lives gives it a better chance of surviving.
highlights.selected_text: The time to nurse an idea is at the time of its birth. Every minute it lives gives it a better chance of surviving

highlights.representative_text: Riches do not respond to wishes. They respond only to definite plans, backed by definite desires, through constant PERSISTENCE.
highlights.selected_text: Riches do not respond to wishes. They respond only to definite plans, backed by definite desires, through constant PERSISTENCE.

highlights.representative_text: It is a well-known fact that matter may be broken down into units of molecules, atoms, protons, neutrons, and electrons.
highlights.selected_text: It is a well-known fact that matter may be broken down into units of molecules, atoms, protons, neutrons

highlights.representative_text: Keep in mind the fact that there are only two known substances in the whole universe--energy and matter.
highlights.selected_text: there are only two known substances in the whole universe--energy and matter

highlights.representative_text: Ford's intimate personal friends, some of whom have already been mentioned, and you will be prepared to understand the following statement: "Individuals take on the nature and the habits and the POWER OF THOUGHT of those with whom they associate in a spirit of sympathy and harmony."
highlights.selected_text: Individuals take on the nature and the habits and the POWER OF THOUGHT of those with whom they associate in a spirit of sympathy and harmony

highlights.representative_text: The 10 Mind Stimuli
highlights.selected_text: The 10 Mind Stimuli

highlights.representative_text: The desire cannot and should not be submerged or eliminated. But it should not be allowed to dominate or dictate one's behavior. It should be given an extra outlet through forms of expression which enrich the body, mind, and spirit. If not given this form of outlet, through the process of transmutation, it will seek outlets through purely physical channels.
highlights.selected_text: The desire cannot and should not be submerged or eliminated. But it should not be allowed to dominate or dictate one's behavior. It should be given an extra outlet through forms of expression which enrich the body, mind, and spirit. If not given this form of outlet, through the process of transmutation, it will seek outlets through purely physical channels.

highlights.representative_text: The emotion of sex contains the secret of creative ability.
highlights.selected_text: The emotion of sex contains the secret of creative ability.

highlights.representative_text: The faculty of Creative Imagination is the direct link between the finite human mind and Infinite Intelligence.
highlights.selected_text: The faculty of Creative Imagination is the direct link between the finite human mind and Infinite Intelligence

highlights.representative_text: A river may be dammed, and its water controlled for a time, but eventually it will force an outlet. The same is true of the emotion of sex. It may be submerged and controlled for a time, but its very nature causes it ever to be seeking a means of expression.
highlights.selected_text: A river may be dammed, and its water controlled for a time, but eventually it will force an outlet. The same is true of the emotion of sex. It may be submerged and controlled for a time, but its very nature causes it ever to be seeking a means of expression

highlights.representative_text: When ideas or concepts flash into one's mind through what is popularly called a hunch, they come from one or more of the following four sources: Infinite Intelligence one's subconscious mind, wherein is stored every sense impression and thought impulse which ever reached the brain through any of the five regular senses

highlights.representative_text: When lifted to this "higher level of thought" through any form of mind stimulation, an individual occupies, relatively speaking, the same position as one who has ascended in an airplane to a height from which may be seen objects beyond the horizon line that limits one's vision while on the ground.

highlights.representative_text: They hold this picture in mind until it has been taken over by their subconscious mind, then they relax by clearing their mind of ALL thought and waiting for their answer to flash into their mind.
highlights.selected_text: waiting for their answer to flash into their mind.

highlights.representative_text: The individual is in a world of thought in which ORDINARY, workaday thoughts have been as effectively removed as are the hills and valleys and other limitations of physical vision when that person rises in the airplane.

highlights.representative_text: The normal faculty of reason is often faulty because it is largely guided by one's accumulated experience. But not all knowledge which one accumulates through experience is accurate. Ideas received through the creative faculty are much more reliable because they come from sources more reliable than any which are available to the reasoning faculty of the mind.
highlights.selected_text: The normal faculty of reason is often faulty because it is largely guided by one's accumulated experience. But not all knowledge which one accumulates through experience is accurate. Ideas received through the creative faculty are much more reliable because they come from sources more reliable than any which are available to the reasoning faculty of the mind.

highlights.representative_text: The Sixth Sense is the defining faculty which marks the difference between a genius and an ordinary individual.
highlights.selected_text: The Sixth Sense is the defining faculty which marks the difference between a genius and an ordinary individual.

highlights.representative_text: There never has been and never will be a great leader, builder, or artist lacking in this driving force of sex.
highlights.selected_text: There never has been and never will be a great leader, builder, or artist lacking in this driving force of sex.

highlights.representative_text: The mere possession of this energy itself is not sufficient to produce a genius. The energy must be transmuted from desire for merely physical contact, into some other form of desire and action before it will lift one to the status of a genius.
highlights.selected_text: The mere possession of this energy itself is not sufficient to produce a genius. The energy must be transmuted from desire for merely physical contact, into some other form of desire and action before it will lift one to the status of a genius.

highlights.representative_text: The human mind responds to stimulation! Among the greatest and most powerful of these stimuli is the sexual urge. When harnessed and transmuted, this driving force is capable of lifting individuals into that higher sphere of thought which enables them to master the sources of worry and petty annoyance which beset their pathway on the lower planes.
highlights.selected_text: The human mind responds to stimulation! Among the greatest and most powerful of these stimuli is the sexual urge. When harnessed and transmuted, this driving force is capable of lifting individuals into that higher sphere of thought

underlines.representative_text: Let us consider the power of FAITH as it was demonstrated by Mahatma Gandhi of India,6 who exhorted his followers to “Be the change you want to see in the world.”

The watchword of the future will be HUMAN HAPPINESS AND CONTENTMENT, and when this state of mind shall have been attained, the production will take care of itself more effectively than anything that has ever been accomplished where workers did not, and could not, mix FAITH and individual interest with their labor.

That may seem to be an axiomatic statement, but it is true.
I say it is a tragedy because it is the self-same POWER which must be used by every individual who surmounts the difficulties of life and forces life to pay the price asked.
